item.title: 美国破产法院批准重组计划，Wolfspeed 公司股价大涨
item.description: 芯片制造商 Wolfspeed 的股价周二大涨约 48%，达到 1.82 美元，此前该公司称美国法院确认了其破产保护重组计划，为其在未来几周内退出破产保护扫清了道路。【原文：Chipmaker Wolfspeed's shares surged about 48% to $1.82 on Tuesday after it said a U.S. court confirmed its Chapter 11 reorganization plan, clearing the way to exit bankruptcy protection in the next several weeks.】

item.title: VIEW 美国 3 月份就业人数增长大幅下调
item.description: 美国政府周二表示，在截至3月份的12个月里，美国经济创造的就业岗位可能比此前估计的少91.1万个，这表明在唐纳德-特朗普总统对进口商品征收激进关税之前，就业增长就已经陷入停滞。【原文：The U.S. economy likely created 911,000 fewer jobs in the 12 months through March than previously estimated, the government said on Tuesday, suggesting job growth was already stalling before President Donald Trump's aggressive tariffs on imports.】

item.title: 美国司法部称，诺福克南方公司将给予美国铁路公司列车货运优先权
item.description: 美国司法部周二表示，诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）已同意让美国铁路公司（Amtrak）的客运列车比货运列车享有 "最高优先权"。【原文：Norfolk Southern has agreed to give Amtrak passenger trains the "highest priority" over freight trains, the U.S. Justice Department said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Artemis 董事长皮诺表示，彪马股份不具战略意义，所有选择都将保留
item.description: 控制古驰（Gucci）所有者开云集团（Kering）的私人控股公司阿尔特米斯（Artemis）董事长弗朗索瓦-亨利-皮诺（Francois-Henri Pinault）周二表示，阿尔特米斯持有运动服装制造商彪马 29% 的股份 "不具有战略意义"。【原文：Francois-Henri Pinault, chairman of the privately-owned holding company Artemis that controls Gucci-owner Kering, said on Tuesday that Artemis' 29% stake in sportswear maker Puma was "not strategic."】

item.title: Kering 股东批准任命 Luca de Meo 为首席执行官
item.description: 古驰（Gucci）所有者开云集团（Kering）的股东们在周二举行的特别股东大会上批准了卢卡-德-梅奥（Luca de Meo）担任集团首席执行官的任命。【原文：Shareholders for Gucci owner Kering approved the appointment of Luca de Meo as the group's CEO at its extraordinary shareholder meeting on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧盟批准 Doordash 收购 Deliveroo
item.description: 欧盟委员会周二表示，已批准美国送餐公司 DoorDash 收购 Deliveroo。【原文：The EU Commission on Tuesday said it had approved the takeover of Deliveroo by U.S. meal delivery firm DoorDash .】

item.title: 即时观点：以色列袭击卡塔尔后，石油飙升，黄金创下新纪录
item.description: 周二，以色列军方称对卡塔尔的哈马斯领导人发动了袭击，标志着该地区冲突升级，投资者抢购传统避险资产，黄金短暂创下历史新高。【原文：Investors snapped up traditional safe-haven assets on Tuesday, sending gold briefly to a new record high, after the Israeli military said it carried out an attack on Hamas leadership in Qatar, marking an escalation of the conflict in the region.】

item.title: 尽管航空供应链不断改善，空中客车公司首席执行官仍对发动机忧心忡忡
item.description: 空中客车公司首席执行官纪尧姆-福瑞（Guillaume Faury）周二表示，在这家欧洲飞机制造商努力增加喷气机交付量之际，发动机仍然是航空供应链中最具挑战性的部分。【原文：Airbus CEO Guillaume Faury said on Tuesday that engines remain the most challenging part of the aerospace supply chain, as the European planemaker seeks to grow jet deliveries.】

item.title: 美国 3 月份就业增长大幅下调
item.description: 美国政府周二表示，在截至3月份的12个月里，美国经济创造的就业岗位可能比此前估计的少91.1万个，这表明在唐纳德-特朗普总统对进口商品征收激进关税之前，就业增长已经陷入停滞。【原文：The U.S. economy likely created 911,000 fewer jobs in the 12 months through March than previously estimated, the government said on Tuesday, suggesting that job growth was already stalling before President Donald Trump's aggressive tariffs on imports.】

item.title: 对冲基金攀上八月高点，保持积极回报
item.description: 银行报告和熟悉对冲基金的消息来源显示，8 月份，随着股市（尤其是美国和亚洲股市）飙升至新高，以及医疗保健和科技行业股价的反弹，对冲基金的回报率受到了提振。【原文：Hedge fund returns were buoyed in August as stock markets raced to fresh highs, particularly in the United States and Asia, and shares in health care and technology industries rallied, bank reports and sources familiar with the funds suggest.】

item.title: 即将上任的 Kering 首席执行官 de Meo：修复集团需要 "清晰有力 "的决策
item.description: 即将上任的开云集团首席执行官卢卡-德-梅奥（Luca de Meo）周二在股东大会上表示，他将带领这家陷入困境的奢侈品集团重回正轨，其中包括做出 "明确而有力 "的决定，但这并不容易。【原文：Incoming Kering chief executive Luca de Meo told a shareholder meeting on Tuesday he would bring the struggling luxury group back on track, which will include taking "clear and strong" decisions that won't be easy.】

item.title: Klarna 将为期待已久的美国 IPO 定价，推动金融科技公司上市
item.description: 瑞典 "现购现付 "贷款公司 Klarna 将于本周二晚些时候为其期待已久的美国首次公开募股定价，这将为该公司的首次公开募股奠定基础，它将成为高增长金融科技公司上市的风向标，受到市场的密切关注。【原文：Swedish buy-now, pay-later lender Klarna is set to price its long-awaited U.S. IPO later on Tuesday, setting the stage for a market debut closely watched as a bellwether for high-growth fintech listings.】

item.title: 富国银行称美国消费者财务状况强劲，信用良好
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo）首席财务官迈克-桑托马西莫（Mike Santomassimo）周二表示，美国消费者正在增加支出并按时支付账单，这反映出他们的财务状况持续健康。【原文：U.S. consumers are raising spending and paying bills on time, reflecting their continued financial health, said Wells Fargo Chief Financial Officer Mike Santomassimo on Tuesday.】

item.title: 蒙特卡洛银行如何从濒临倒闭到收购 Mediobanca
item.description: Monte dei Paschi di Siena（MPS）以 160 亿欧元（约合 190 亿美元）的股份加现金收购价获得了对 Mediobanca 的控制权。【原文：Monte dei Paschi di Siena (MPS) has secured control of Mediobanca , with a 16 billion euro ($19 billion) share-and-cash offer.】

item.title: 预计 8 月份巴西消费者价格比 7 月份下降 0.15%：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，得益于电费的特别折扣和食品成本的良性趋势，巴西 8 月份的消费者价格指数预计将比 7 月份下降 0.15%。【原文：Brazil's consumer price index is forecast to have dropped 0.15% in August against July thanks to a special discount in electricity bills and benign trends in food costs, a Reuters poll showed.】

item.title: 挪威表示，尽管卡特彼勒发生争执，但挪威仍寻求保持对美国的大量投资
item.description: 挪威财政大臣延斯-斯托尔滕贝格（Jens Stoltenberg）周二表示，他希望挪威2万亿美元的主权财富基金（世界上最大的主权财富基金）能够维持目前的投资政策，即大约一半的资产投资于美国。【原文：Norway's Finance Minister Jens Stoltenberg said on Tuesday he hopes the country's $2 trillion sovereign wealth fund, the world's largest, can maintain its current investment policy in which about half the assets are invested in the U.S.】

item.title: 秘密的洛克希德和 BAE 实验室联手研究新型无人机
item.description: 英国 BAE 系统公司和美国军火巨头洛克希德-马丁公司宣布，双方的秘密研究单位将合作开发一种新型无人驾驶自主飞行系统，这在炙手可热的无人机领域是罕见的研究合作。【原文：Britain's BAE Systems and U.S. arms giant Lockheed Martin announced a tie-up between their secretive research units to develop a new uncrewed autonomous air system, a rare research partnership in the red-hot drone sector.】

item.title: 智利 Codelco 公司负责人表示，盎格鲁泰克公司的协议约束了 "价值非凡 "的资产
item.description: 智利国营铜生产商 Codelco 公司董事长 Maximo Pacheco 周二告诉路透社记者，英美资源集团和泰克公司之间的协议汇集了 "价值非凡 "的资产。【原文：The agreement between Anglo American and Teck brings together assets of "extraordinary value," the chairman of Chile's state-run copper producer Codelco, Maximo Pacheco, told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 沃尔玛将于年底前在非洲开设首批门店
item.description: 美国零售商沃尔玛周二表示，将于今年在南非推出首批品牌商店。【原文：U.S. retailer Walmart will launch its first branded stores in South Africa this year, it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，随着加密货币相关股票需求飙升，稳定币发行商 Figure Technologies 将扩大 IPO 规模
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社，随着散户投资者竞相追捧加密货币相关股票，稳定币发行商Figure Technologies正在扩大首次公开募股的规模并提高价格。【原文：Stablecoin issuer Figure Technologies is increasing the size and upping the price of its initial public offering as retail investors bid up crypto-related stocks, a person familiar with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: Sabadell 首席执行官希望 BBVA 提高对该银行的收购报价
item.description: 萨瓦德尔银行首席执行官塞萨尔-冈萨雷斯-布埃诺（Cesar Gonzalez-Bueno）周二表示，希望西班牙对外银行（BBVA）提出更高的收购报价，并称西班牙竞争对手的恶意收购出价低估了该银行的价值。【原文：Sabadell Chief Executive Cesar Gonzalez-Bueno expects BBVA to submit a higher offer for his bank, he said on Tuesday, adding that its Spanish competitor's hostile takeover bid undervalues the lender.】

item.title: 贝克休斯加入加州巨型地热发电项目
item.description: 美国油田服务公司贝克休斯（Baker Hughes）周二表示，该公司正与加利福尼亚州的受控热资源公司（Controlled Thermal Resources）合作开发世界上最大的单一地热发电项目之一，并计划将电力销售给数据中心。【原文：U.S. oilfield services firm Baker Hughes is collaborating with Controlled Thermal Resources in California to develop one of the world's largest single geothermal power projects, with plans to market the electricity to data centers, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 定价小组称减肥药更具成本效益
item.description: 周二，一个有影响力的药品定价监督机构称，随着GLP-1减肥注射剂价格的下降和研究证明其对心血管健康的益处，这种流行的药物变得更具成本效益。【原文：An influential drug pricing watchdog on Tuesday said popular GLP-1 weight-loss injections have become more cost-effective as their prices have fallen and studies have shown proof of their cardiovascular health benefits.】

item.title: VistaShares 推出追踪对冲基金激进分子比尔-阿克曼股票押注的 ETF
item.description: 资产管理公司 VistaShares 已选择知名投资者比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）作为其最新交易所交易基金的模仿基金经理。【原文：Asset manager VistaShares has selected high-profile investor Bill Ackman as the fund manager to mimic in its newest exchange-traded fund.】

item.title: 老年医疗人工智能公司 Teton.ai 获 2000 万美元融资
item.description: Teton.ai是一家利用专有人工智能和计算机视觉技术为老年人提供预测性护理的公司，该公司在一轮融资中筹集了2000万美元，由爱沙尼亚和总部位于伦敦的投资基金Plural领投。【原文：Teton.ai, a company that uses proprietary AI and computer vision technology to provide predictive care for older people, has raised $20 million in a funding round led by Estonia and London-based investment fund Plural.】

item.title: 百胜餐饮集团在领导层调整中任命内部人士 Ranjith Roy 担任首席财务官
item.description: 本周二，百胜餐饮集团任命高管兰吉斯-罗伊（Ranjith Roy）为肯德基母公司的财务总监，接替即将接任首席执行官的克里斯-特纳（Chris Turner）。【原文：Yum Brands named executive Ranjith Roy as the KFC parent's finance chief on Tuesday, replacing Chris Turner who is taking over as CEO.】

item.title: 在 AT&T 和 SpaceX 达成交易后，FCC 将结束 EchoStar 对 5G 和频谱义务的调查
item.description: 根据美国联邦通信委员会周二提交的一份监管文件，该委员会将终止对 EchoStar 在美国的 5G 建设义务的调查。【原文：The U.S. Federal Communications Commission will terminate its investigation into EchoStar's 5G buildout obligations in the country, according to a regulatory filing from the company on Tuesday.】

item.title: 调查发现，近一半的以色列初创科技公司在国外注册成立
item.description: 以色列先进技术产业协会（IATI）周二表示，近一半的新创企业选择在以色列境外注册成立，理由是美国的法规更为宽松。【原文：Nearly half of new startups are choosing to incorporate outside of Israel, the Israel Advanced Technology Industries Association (IATI) said on Tuesday, citing easier regulations in the United States.】

item.title: UnitedHealth 预计顶级医疗保险计划的会员资格符合预期
item.description: 联合健康（UnitedHealth）周二表示，预计顶级医疗保险计划的注册人数将符合其预期。【原文：UnitedHealth said on Tuesday it expects enrollment in top-rated Medicare insurance plans to be in line with its expectations.】

item.title: ASML-Mistral人工智能交易提振欧洲科技希望，特朗普竞争白热化
item.description: 荷兰芯片设备制造商ASML斥资15亿美元收购法国人工智能公司Mistral，为欧洲的人工智能雄心注入了一剂强心针，也为欧洲在美国和亚洲竞争对手的主导下获得更多地区科技主权带来了希望。【原文：Dutch chip-gear maker ASML's $1.5 billion investment in French artificial intelligence firm Mistral has given a shot in the arm to Europe's AI ambitions and hopes for more regional tech sovereignty against the dominance of U.S. and Asian rivals.】
